version_description:
Thank you for using our Quran Application, we are constantly trying to improve and update the app to provide you with the best Quran experience.
This update includes a lot of new features that you requested, performance enhancements and bug fixes. Please give us 5 star rating and review if you like the app. It helps us a lot when you do.

- Pinch to zoom and increase the font size.
- Double click to use the app in full screen mode.
- Easily scroll between pages, juz' or souwar while reading with our newly updated scroller feature.
- Customize the prayer timing to your preference with full flexibility.
- Now you can select your preferred Azan sound or choose to be notified silently.
- Qibla direction added.
- Faster search with our auto search upgrade.
- Uplift to the ayah tafseer page with the ability to copy, share and play tafseer. Switching to different tafseers or going to the next one.
- Now you can copy and share any word tafseer directly from the Quran or the words tafseer page.
- Added new reciters.
- Screen will not automatically lock while you are reading.
- Turn on download on WIFI only setting to prevent from phone consuming cellular data while you are not connected.

Thank you for using our Quran Application, we are constantly trying to improve and update the app to provide you with the best Quran experience.
This update includes a lot of new features that you requested, performance enhancements and bug fixes. Please give us 5 star rating and review if you like the app. It helps us a lot when you do.
- Change Font setting, choose which font you want to use for the tafseer.
- Optimized search even more.
- Now you can select and copy any part from the Tafseer.
- Added ayat number and tartibouha in the title for each Sourah.

- Now you can copy and share any word tafseer directly from the Quran or the words tafseer page.
- Added new reciters.
- Screen will not automatically lock while you are reading.
- Turn on download on WIFI only setting to prevent from phone consuming cellular data while you are not connected.

Thank you for using our Quran Application, we are constantly trying to improve and update the app to provide you with the best Quran experience.

This update includes a lot of new features that you requested, performance enhancements and bug fixes. Please give us 5 star rating and review if you like the app. It helps us a lot when you do.

- Click on a the special golden verse numbers to read a "لفتة" about the verse.
- Now you will receive a special daily verse notification that contains a "لفتة".
- You can now get the Hijri time on the top right of the homepage.
- Search result includes now Quran explanations.
- Copy multiple verses at the same time.

We would love to hear your feedback and feature requests. You can reach us at support@massyve.tech
